prompts: Create a sleek, fast-moving Pokemon with a long body and a light brown fur.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends perfectly into forest landscapes, with a streamlined shape.
Design a small, agile creature that can traverse both urban and natural environments effortlessly.
Give me a Normal-type Pokemon that resembles a raccoon, known for its speed and adaptability.
Generate a Pokemon with distinctive white stripes and an overall sleek appearance, perfect for stealth.
Show me a crafty Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas, with a playful and curious demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique blend of brown and cream colors, showcasing agility and speed.
